Italy: The 2006 Winter Olympics are held in Turin (to 26 February).
Prodi's second term as Prime Minister begins.
The Italian national football team wins its fourth FIFA World Cup in Germany.
Italy's engagement is pivotal in the deployment of the UNIFIL peace force after the 2006 Lebanon War.
Roberto Saviano publishes Gomorra, where he describes and denounces the system of Camorra criminal organization around Naples and its ramifications.
Italian government withdraws Italian troops from Iraq, ending the Operation Ancient Babylon.
